code: import React from'react';import{LineChart,Line,YAxis,XAxis,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EngagementGraph=props=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:'80%',height:'75%',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:props.data,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"engagement_level",stroke:"#f5f5f5",strokeWidth:"5",isAnimationActive:false,dot:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"time",allowDataOverflow:true,style:{fontSize:'calc(10px + 1.25vmin)',stroke:'#5b6477',fill:'#676767',fontFamily:'Staatliches'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{dataKey:"engagement_level",domain:['dataMin','dataMax'],allowDataOverflow:true,style:{fontSize:'calc(10px + 1.25vmin)',stroke:'#5b6477',fill:'#676767',fontFamily:'Staatliches'}})]})});};export default EngagementGraph;
